name: Viking Brothers 2
description: Join the Viking Brothers on an all-new, humor-filled adventure!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 3 GHZ processor or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
